original_text: Do not think that you are better than other people. Always be kind and patient with each other. Love one another, so that you do not quickly become angry with each other.
korean_text: 모든 겸손과 온유로 하고 오래 참음으로 사랑 가운데서 서로 용납하고

sentences.original_text: Do not think that you are better than other people
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들보다 자신이 더 낫다고 생각하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Always be kind and patient with each other
so that you do not quickly become angry with each other
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하면 서로에게 쉽게 화를 내지 않을 것이라
